modal.title: Recovery Phrase
modal.subtitle: Read the following, then save the phrase securely.

steps.0: Your recovery phrase provides full access to your wallets and funds.
steps.1: In case you forget your password, the recovery phrase allows you to regain access to your wallet.
steps.2: Keep your recovery phrase private and never share it with anyone.

generateSeedPhrase.title: Your wallet has been created
generateSeedPhrase.subtitle:
Securely note your seed phrase 
it's your key to wallet recovery.

modal.title: Secure Your Wallet
modal.subtitle: Read the following, then save the phrase securely.

steps.0: Your mnemonic phrase will be hashed and sent to the server.
steps.1: Hashing and dehashing happen on the client side, so we do not store your password or the mnemonic phrase itself.
steps.2: Only you will have access to your mnemonic phrase by knowing your chosen password.
